Title: Streets of Rage
RichPresencePatch:
Lookup:Stage
0x0=on the City Street
0x1=in the Inner City
0x2=on the Beachfront
0x3=on the Bridge
0x4=aboard the Ship
0x5=in the Factory
0x6=in the Freight Elevator
0x7=in the Syndicate Headquarters

Format:Score
FormatType=VALUE

Format:Continue
FormatType=VALUE

Lookup:Char
0x0=Axel
0x1=Adam
0x2=Blaze

Lookup:Difficulty
0x0=Easy
0x1=Normal
0x2=Hard
0x3=Hardest

Format:Lives
FormatType=VALUE

Format:Time
FormatType=VALUE

Display:
Beating everyone with @Char(0xhff1f) @Stage(0xhff02), 🚶:@Lives(0xhff21), 💞:@Continue(0xhff1a), 🕐:@Time(b0xfb00), ⚖:@Difficulty(0xhffc6), 💯:@Score(0xuff08)@Score(0xlff08)@Score(0xuff0b)@Score(0xlff0b)00.
